short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free screen recorder and webcam recorder

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The easiest way to record videos, combine your webcam and screen effortlessly. Then share your video with your team and or the world.

Motionbox record is a fresh take on screen recording tools and pairs nicely with our online collaborative video editing tool. You will get video creation super powers when you use Motionbox.

Get everyone in your organization involved with the video process, using the Motionbox recorder is easy and only requires a few clicks. Your team will be able to create all kinds of videos from internal docs to social media content. Here are some reasons to use Motionbox record

- asynchronous feedback
- share ideas quickly via visuals
- create social media content quickly
- share updates with stakeholders
- create engaging video documentation
- automatic transcriptions
- cloud based video hosting
- drive engagement internally and or externally
- video editing capabilities (add text, trim, merge videos, overlay video, etc)
